We've been onboarding some big clients and specifically need a SRE for our client.About Our ClientOur client is a leading global specialty retailer offering high-quality, on-trend clothing, accessories and personal care products at affordable prices. Our clients brand is built on more than 40 years of customer focus, dedication and innovation. Starting with one store in 1977, our brands have grown to more than 1,000 stores in the United States, Canada, Mexico, China and Hong Kong, and ship to over 80 countries worldwide through our websites and mobile applications. Our clients merchandise also is available at more than 200 international locations operated by licensees in 25 countries.The OpportunityProactively address potential stability / performance challenges
